body_html:
This does indeed sound like a bug, perhaps with the while_loop. Can you
provide a minimal failing example?

On Sep 9, 2016 8:39 PM, "Lukasz Kaiser" notifications@github.com wrote:

Looks like a bug -- please, let us know when you dig some more
information. The seq2seq code didn't change much with state_is_tuple, so
it's very strange what you're seeing.

—

This does indeed sound like a bug, perhaps with the while_loop.  Can you
provide a minimal failing example?

On Sep 9, 2016 8:39 PM, "Lukasz Kaiser" notifications@github.com wrote:

> Looks like a bug -- please, let us know when you dig some more
> information. The seq2seq code didn't change much with state_is_tuple, so
> it's very strange what you're seeing.
